Before 'Back 4 Blood'. This game started it all in the online multiplayer zombie survival genre. 

With hours of gameplay to put into its many game modes, and tons of gibs to spray. I recommend this horror for the die-hardest of fans in the zombie fandom.

game not worth buying bc it got replaced by left4dead 2 as you can play the left4dead1 campaigns and this game makes me lag even in my own servers, it has worse optimization, hitreg is worse. the left4dead2 versions of the left4dead 1 campaigns are harder but still. there are 5 reasons i can think of why people still play this game. 1. the maps are easier as there are no jockeys or spitters, no spitters means u can be a camping ape in certain spots. 2. some people prefer the older versions of the maps because there are things in the left4dead2 ports that you cannot do. 3. mechanics are different. 4. achievements  5. nostalgia.
this game never disappoints, from the characters, the campaigns and the atmosphere. everything in this game is gold. plus, it reminds me of my early days at the comp-shop with my papa. ü§ó

Been playing Left 4 Dead since it's release, it's timeless and challenging. :D 

#L4D #Valve #Steam
I bought this game just hear peelz and Francis hating everything.
A game so good that it single-handedly launched the 4-player survival game craze that persists even now. Some say that you can hear the developers failing to remake it to this very day.
Es un bueno juego, lo puedes jugar en cualquier pc!

While I do recommend buying Left 4 Dead 2 over this, this is still a really well put together game that still deserves some attention even after you've played everything there is to play in L4D2. I have well over 1k hours in L4D2 yet I still have tons of hours into here with many more to come. Do not get this game expecting to join versus lobbies and play with randoms. While there is about 500-600 players a day on L4D1, you'll only ever see co-op campaigns or nothing at all.
Its an iconic game but still addicted after many years,its really fun to play with your friends if u playing solo it still a great expericences too.Highly reccomend!!!

F√ºr wenig Geld definitiv ein gutes Spiel! Habe bisher nur die Kampagne rein gezockt und ab und zu mal den Koop-Modus ausprobiert. Meine Erfahrungen mit diesem Spiel sind nur positiv. 

Die Kampagne macht wirklich Laune und die Dialoge sind teilweise echt witzig. 
Auch wie das Spiel Gemacht ist (Physik, Weltdetails, Mapdesign etc.) gef√§llt mir sehr sehr gut, wenn man bedenkt das dass Game doch schon ein wenig in die Jahre gekommen ist (2008).
